title: Malcolm
description: He was happy with his quiet life.With the club, with his family, with his cabin in the woods.He didn’t think he needed more than that.Not until he came across her.But when a string of unfortunate events starts to seem less like happenstance and more like something someone had planned.But who?Why?And would Malcolm be able to figure it out before the next phase of the plan went into play…
author: Jessica Gadziala
